data.title: Very average breakfast
data.text:
Very average café near Whittier college.

The staff is very friendly, and the service is pretty good.  Plus, parking is a breeze behind the restaurant.  Those are some great positives.  However, the food is just your basic eggs, plain omelets, and standard fare.

If you want some food that’s a bit more interesting, just go a few blocks to downtown Whittier.  Lots of great little cafes, coffee drops, and bakeries.  

It’s up to you.  If you want standard fare, check out California Grill.  If you want something a bit more interesting, go to the little village of Whittier.

data.title: Nice lunch/dinner  locale
data.text: California grill has a nice variety of foods on their menu. Across from Whittier College, it's a convenient stop when visiting the college's performing arts venue across the street. Good variety of beers as well. The chicken tortilla soup is tasty and their salmon entree is worth the stop. My girls love the Newporter sandwich on the menu since they were little.

data.title: Consistently good!
data.text: The food and service is always good.  Their breakfast menu never disappoints. The menu is extensive enough to always find what you want.

data.title: Never a bad meal!
data.text: We have been coming to the California Grill for years and have never been disappointed.  They have new offerings often which have always been good and we also have our favorites that we return for. We have had family gatherings here and there is such a variety of choices, everyone's taste can be satisfied.

data.title: First timer
data.text: We had a huge party outside in the patio. The service was good since it's so difficult serving a large party. The staff was friendly and the food was good. Lots of selections to choose from salads to sandwiches.

data.title: Occasional brunch after church.
data.text: A family restaurant. Good food and reasonable price; clean and great service. Menu is varied all three meals. Indoor and patio dining. Convenient location, Painter Avenue in uptown Whittier. Sports TV and quiet ambience. Beer and wine.

data.title: Amazing food, amazing service!
data.text: My grandmother took me here to eat when we visited SoCal, and we sat for hours talking.  The service never waned and was always pleasant.  The food was amazing.  This is a must stop location!

data.title: Good food and great service!
data.text: My wife and I ate here this morning with friends and the service was excellent.  Our server as very good, and we loved the breakfast meal.  Plus, I love restaurants with booths for visiting or meetings, and this one has that covered.  I like the relaxing atmosphere here.

data.title: Out for lunch
data.text: Very good service very good dishes for seafood one of the best here in Brea California friendly staff sometimes it gets a little bit overwhelmed but it's worth it to wait a bit

data.title: French Dips
data.text: It's my favorite thing here and they go through good and bad times, right now the sandwich is in one of the best times they've had. Sometimes they get cheap on the meat but not for the last 4 months! Just needs more au jus!!

data.title: Neighborhood Star
data.text: The menu offers a variety of California cuisine that will please all diners regardless of the meal ordered. Generous portions at reasonable prices with a friendly and helpful staff. We have been served consistently high quality meals at each visit. Ample parking in their lot and adjacent street.

data.title: Good food, venue too small for volume of people it brings in.
data.text: While menu is good. The restaurant does not accommodate the volume of people. Lots of waiting for table, people watching/waiting over shoulder for table.

data.title: Happy always when we go there
data.text: Best to eat from breakfast to dinner. Friendly place Nd. Always good food Nd.never unhappy about the food

data.title: Great family restaurant in uptown!
data.text: We have been coming to this place on and off for years, mainly breakfast, and always happy with the food and service. We had a very large party one evening in May and very late in the evening and the staff accomodated us. We called ahead and the table was ready upon arrival and the server did an exceptional job handling our large party such as splitting the bill, getting our food right, etc. I wish i remembered his name but he was a young, light haired gentlemen working the late evening of may 14th. The fod was great and have to give a special shout out to the jalapeno pasta with chicken. It was a pleasant surprise and everyone complimented it at the table. The staff was also very patient in handling our big group of kids as well. Overall, if you are looking for good option for family dining in uptown this is a place to go.

data.title: Love their breakfast
data.text: We go here often for breakfast, and cannot remember having a bad meal. Staff is always friendly and welcoming, and the service is good.  Breakfast is consistency well prepared.  Poached eggs and omelets are cooked properly, potatoes are cooked the way each person requests, they keep the coffee cups filled, and they have wonderful warm muffins.

data.title: Long Wait and Cold Food
data.text:
First of all take a jumper as the air conditioning in this place works too well. I wanted to sit outside but there was a graduation party going on therefore had to sit inside and it was freezing! Our food took 40 minutes to arrive and when it did the sweet potato fries were cold. The servers were very good at their job and replaced the fries very quickly as well as giving me menues to cover the ac vents.

One really scary point of interest is that this restaurant seats 200 people and there is only one ladies toilet and one gents toilet! These toilets are also used by the staff. This arrangement is totally crazy and I am amazed that they are granted a licence to trade at all under these conditions. Certainly here in the UK this would never be allowed by Environmental Health.

Be prepared for a long wait to use the facilities if you visit when it is busy.

data.title: Great Breakfast
data.text: We stopped in here for breakfast early on a Saturday. It was fantastic. The service was prompt and enjoyable. The food was spectacular!

data.title: Sunday Breakfast Here We Come!!
data.text: California breakfast is almost always my first thought when the boyfriend asks about breakfast Sunday mornings. It helps that's it's really right down the street from us. I would give them the 5 rating but service can be not so awesome at times. I honestly think it's cause they keep them understaffed on the weekends. The food however is never a disappointment I've tried many things and they are all fantastic!

data.title: Fresh and Reasonable
data.text: Variety of food for breakfast, lunch, and dinner to please any picky eater. Salads, sandwiches, main meals etc. Has a great outdoor patio to enjoy a view of Whittier College or Uptown.

data.title: Great food
data.text: Really great burgers and bruschetta! Not expensive and worth the money for the food you get. They have a couple of fish tanks in the restaurant too, which my 8 yr old likes. It's a good spot for a family lunch or dinner. They have a variety of menu choices.
